prep_directions: Heat the oil in a large skillet over medium-high heat. Add the ground beef, onion and bell pepper. Cook until beef is browned, about 5 minutes. Stir in the chili powder, cumin, garlic powder, paprika, oregano and salt and pepper. Cook for 1 minute more.
Add the rice and diced tomatoes and stir until all the ingredients are combined. Cook for 5 minutes. Add the black beans and stir to combine. Cook for an additional 5 minutes.
Serve and enjoy!
Preheat oven to 400 degrees F.
In a small bowl, mix together the olive oil, garlic, paprika, cumin, onion powder, salt and pepper.
Place salmon in a baking dish and pour the olive oil mixture over the top. Rub the mixture into the salmon.
Bake for 15-20 minutes, or until salmon is cooked through.
Serve and enjoy!
Preheat oven to 400 degrees F.
In a large bowl, mix together the cubed sweet potatoes, olive oil, garlic powder, cumin, paprika, salt and pepper.
Spread the sweet potatoes onto a baking sheet and bake for 25-30 minutes, or until potatoes are cooked through.
Serve and enjoy!
In a large bowl, mix together the cubed chicken, olive oil, lemon juice, garlic powder, oregano, basil, thyme, paprika, salt and pepper.
Cover and refrigerate for at least two hours.
Preheat oven to 375 degrees F.
Spread the chicken onto a baking sheet and bake for 25-30 minutes, or until chicken is cooked through.
Serve and enjoy!

Heat a large skillet over medium-high heat. Add the ground turkey, onion and bell pepper. Cook until turkey is browned, about 8 minutes. Stir in the garlic, cumin, chili powder, paprika, red pepper flakes and salt and pepper.
Cook for an additional 5 minutes, stirring occasionally.
Serve and enjoy!

ingredients: 1 lb of shrimp, peeled and deveined
prep_directions: Heat a large skillet over medium-high heat. Add the olive oil and garlic. Cook for 1 minute.
Add the shrimp and season with the paprika, oregano, red pepper flakes, salt and pepper. Cook for 3-4 minutes, or until shrimp is cooked through.
Serve and enjoy!
Heat a large skillet over medium-high heat. Add the olive oil and garlic. Cook for 1 minute.
Add the cubed chicken and season with the oregano, paprika, cumin, salt and pepper. Cook for 8-10 minutes, or until chicken is cooked through.
Serve and enjoy!
Heat a large skillet over medium-high heat. Add the ground beef, onion and bell pepper. Cook until beef is browned, about 8 minutes.
Stir in the tomato paste, chili powder, cumin, paprika, red pepper flakes and salt and pepper. Cook for an additional 5 minutes.
Serve and enjoy!
Heat the olive oil in a large skillet over medium-high heat. Add the onion and bell pepper. Cook until softened, about 5 minutes.
Stir in the garlic powder, cumin, paprika, red pepper flakes, salt and pepper. Cook for 1 minute more.
Add the rice and stir until all the ingredients are combined. Cook for 5 minutes.
Serve and enjoy!
Heat a large skillet over medium-high heat. Add the ground turkey and onion. Cook until turkey is browned, about 8 minutes.
Stir in the corn, black beans, chili powder, cumin, paprika, red pepper flakes and salt and pepper. Cook for an additional 5 minutes.
Serve and enjoy!
Preheat oven to 400 degrees F.
In a small bowl, mix together the olive oil, garlic powder, oregano, paprika, salt and pepper.
Place salmon in a baking dish and pour the olive oil mixture over the top. Rub the mixture into the salmon.
Bake for 15-20 minutes, or until salmon is cooked through.
Serve and enjoy!

ingredients: 1 lb of boneless, skinless chicken thighs
prep_directions: Heat a large skillet over medium-high heat. Add the olive oil and garlic. Cook for 1 minute.
Add the chicken thighs and season with the oregano, paprika, cumin, salt and pepper. Cook for 8-10 minutes, or until chicken is cooked through.
Serve and enjoy!

ingredients: 1 lb of shrimp, peeled and deveined
prep_directions: Heat a large skillet over medium-high heat. Add the olive oil and garlic. Cook for 1 minute.
Add the shrimp and season with the garlic powder, cumin, paprika, red pepper flakes, salt and pepper. Cook for 3-4 minutes, or until shrimp is cooked through.
Serve and enjoy!
Preheat oven to 400 degrees F.
In a large bowl, mix together the cubed sweet potatoes, olive oil, oregano, cumin, paprika, salt and pepper.
Spread the sweet potatoes onto a baking sheet and bake for 25-30 minutes, or until potatoes are cooked through.
Serve and enjoy!
Heat a large skillet over medium-high heat. Add the olive oil, onion and bell pepper. Cook until softened, about 5 minutes.
Add the cubed chicken and season with the garlic powder, cumin, paprika, salt and pepper. Cook for 8-10 minutes, or until chicken is cooked through.
Serve and enjoy!
Heat a large skillet over medium-high heat. Add the ground beef and onion. Cook until beef is browned, about 8 minutes.
Stir in the diced tomatoes, black beans, chili powder, cumin, paprika and salt and pepper. Cook for an additional 5 minutes.
Serve and enjoy!
